scripts.dev: cross-env MEDUSA_CONFIG_FILE=./medusa-config.js NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node" medusa develop
scripts.start: cross-env MEDUSA_CONFIG_FILE=./medusa-config.js NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node" medusa start
scripts.migrate: cross-env MEDUSA_CONFIG_FILE=./medusa-config.js NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node" medusa db:migrate
scripts.seed: cross-env MEDUSA_CONFIG_FILE=./medusa-config.js NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node" medusa exec ./scripts/seed.ts ./data/seed.json
scripts.seed:admin: cross-env MEDUSA_CONFIG_FILE=./medusa-config.js NODE_OPTIONS="--loader ts-node/esm --experimental-specifier-resolution=node" medusa user -e admin@example.com -p supersecret
scripts.services: docker compose -f ../../infrastructure/docker-compose.yml up -d db redis backend
scripts.seed:services: docker compose -f ../../infrastructure/docker-compose.yml exec backend npm run seed
